data.response: Just a quick note about the 'AUI problem': It refers to the challenge of creating Adaptive User Interfaces that can automatically adjust to users' needs and preferences in real-time. MARLUI tackles this using multi-agent reinforcement learning where each agent specializes in different interface aspects. Let me know if you'd like more detail about this approach!
